Aspernatur, nihil explicabo repellat debitis necessitatibus neque fugiat expedita perferendis ab dolorem dolor numquam eum reprehenderit cupiditate?" }, ], } this.removeBlog = this.removeBlog.bind(this); } removeBlog(index){ let { List } = this.state; List.splice(index, 1); this.setState({ List: List }) } render({List} = this.state) { const { t } = this.props; return (

{t('menu.blog')}

{List.map((item, idx) => (

{item.title}

{item.content}

View More...
{item.author}

{item.date}

))}
) } } export default withTranslation()(Blog);
